text: Mark Boone Junior (born Mark Heidrich March 17, 1956) is an American television and movie actor. He is known for his roles in Memento and in Batman Begins as Detective Flass. He played Bobby Munson in Sons of Anarchy. He was born in Cincinnati, Ohio. He was raised in Chicago, Illinois. ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:1955 births Category:Living people Category:American movie actors Category:American television actors Category:American voice actors Category:Actors from Ohio Category:Actors from Chicago
title: Mark Boone Junior
